DESCRIPTION: TODO: Make your own epic keywords
At start of turn, stun target if: Sus greater than or equal to target's total attack intent OR enemy will not attack and Sus >= 20 (either way, consume all stacks of Sus).
Increases attack damage and block for one turn.  Votes trigger when there are at least 10 Votes among us: each creature takes damage equal to (10 * their number of Votes), then all Votes are removed.

Transform your stacks of Frail, Vulnerable, and Weak into 1-turn buffs.  For each unique buff and debuff among us, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.  Remove your Lose Vote debuffs, negative Strength, and negative Dexterity.
